CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local BuildIdx = UISelf:GetBuildIndex() if 1 == BuildIdx then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(3180)) elseif 7 == BuildIdx then UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(3035)) else UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(BuildIdx+3018)) end
local slf = UISelf UI_Click_Book_Cont_Btn(slf) UI_Set_Book_MapNavi(slf:GetParent():GetParent(), 0, slf:GetCustomDataAsStr():GetStr(), "", true)
local slf = UISelf UI_Click_Book_Cont_Btn(slf) UI_Set_Book_MapNavi(slf:GetParent():GetParent(), 0, slf:GetCustomDataAsStr():GetStr(), "", true)

FORM.SCRIPT: local Text1 = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_TEXT1") local Text2 = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_TEXT2") local Text3 = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_TEXT3") local Text4 = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_TEXT4") local Text5 = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_TEXT5") if Text1:IsNil() and Text2:IsNil() and Text3:IsNil() and Text4:IsNil() and Text5:IsNil() then return end Text1:SetStaticText(GetTT(3151 + UISelf:GetBuildIndex()):GetStr()) Text2:SetStaticText(GetTT(3118 + UISelf:GetBuildIndex()):GetStr()) Text3:SetStaticText(GetTT(3165 + UISelf:GetBuildIndex()):GetStr()) Text4:SetStaticText(""..UISelf:GetBuildIndex()) Text5:SetStaticText(GetTT(3339 + UISelf:GetBuildIndex()):GetStr())

EDIT.HOTKEY: if UISelf:IsEditFocus() then ClearEditFocus() return true end

FORM_MOVE_ANIMATE_WND.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf; if kSelf:IsMoveComplate() then UpdateSlideTextViewUI(UISelf:GetParent():GetParent()) end
